summary: Px79 Dual Wield Animation for dual wield class.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-uaUzpolnHlQ/Vb1BoFxjxKI/AAAAAAAAAW4/ZYkRVm7zVx0/s640/px79%2Bdwa%2Bv1.1.png[/img][/center]

First of all, special thank to Bethesda for their awesome game and those who like my DW animation mod. My skyrim Px79 Dual Wield Animation continue with next and final version. After successful created some dual wield animation for DW class, i decide to launch v1.1 with included some new animation and improvement from the previous version.

[color=#00ffff][b]Version 1.0[/b][/color]

-dw_attackpowerback.hkx
-dw_attackpowerforward.hkx
-dw_attackpowerleft.hkx
-dw_attackpowerright.hkx
-dw_sprintforwardsword.hkx
-dw1hm1hm_specialattackpower.hkx
-dw1hm1hmidle.hkx


[color=#00ffff][b]Version 1.1[/b][/color]

[color=#00ff00]New
[/color]
-dw1hm1hm_attackright.hkx
-dw1hm1hm_powerattack.hkx

[color=#00ff00]Improvements[/color]

-dw1hm1hmidle.hkx
-dw_attackpowerback.hkx
-dw_attackpowerleft.hkx
-dw_attackpowerright.hkx



[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]Demo Version 1.0[/size][/color][/b]

[youtube]rXodcW4SP-U[/youtube]



[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]Demo Version 1.1[/size][/color][/b]

[youtube]1a-pvze-s0k[/youtube]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#00ff00][b]Installation :[/b][/color]

-use mod manager or just replace manually (you know how to do it :))
-just replace an old version
-don't install this mod if you have another similar type dual wield animation.
-have no problem with any skyrim and dlc version.


[color=#00ff00][b]Permission :[/b][/color]

This is my last version. You can do what ever you want with my dw animation but one condition [b][color=#ff0000]NEVER UPLOAD IT OUTSIDE OF NEXUS MOD[/color][/b]. I give you permission as a DW lover to improve my version and for your mod. Don't forget to credit me. Lastly, never claim it is was yours and any profitable purpose are not be allowed.


[color=#00ff00][b]Credit :[/b][/color]

Bethesda Softworks (thanks for your awesome game)
author: BlueLight79
